front.title: IEEE Guide for the Application of Surge Protectors Used in Low-Voltage (Equal to Or Less Than 1000 V/Sub Rms/ Or 1200 Vdc) Data, Communications, and Signaling Circuits

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Assistance is provided for the selection of the most appropriate type of low-voltage data, communications, and/or signalling circuit surge protector for a particular application or set of conditions. Surge protector functions and characteristics are also explained and evaluated. AC power circuit applications are not addressed in this document.
